title: The boke of Codrus and Mynalcas
author: Barclay, Alexander, 1475?-1552.
publisher: Emprinted by Richarde Pynson, pri[n]ter to the kynges noble grace,
notes: Designated Barclay's fourth eclogue in the headings and colophon.
Printer's name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
The last leaf bears a printer's mark.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
